sql.query:
SELECT m_product.id, m_product.prod_name_en AS prod_name, m_product.prod_img1, m_product.rest_id, mr.shop_name_en AS shop_name
FROM m_product
LEFT JOIN m_restaurant AS mr ON (mr.id = m_product.rest_id)
WHERE m_product.status = :P1 /* {{1}} */ AND m_product.market_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.market}} */ AND mr.status = :P3 /* {{1}} */ AND (m_product.prod_name_en LIKE :P4 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR m_product.prod_name_bn LIKE :P5 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR m_product.prod_name_hin LIKE :P6 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_en LIKE :P7 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_bn LIKE :P8 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_hin LIKE :P9 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */)

SELECT m_product.id, m_product.prod_img1, m_product.rest_id, m_product.prod_name_bn AS prod_name, mr.shop_name_bn AS shop_name
FROM m_product
LEFT JOIN m_restaurant AS mr ON (mr.id = m_product.rest_id)
WHERE m_product.status = :P1 /* {{1}} */ AND m_product.market_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.market}} */ AND mr.status = :P3 /* {{1}} */ AND (m_product.prod_name_en LIKE :P4 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR m_product.prod_name_bn LIKE :P5 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR m_product.prod_name_hin LIKE :P6 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_en LIKE :P7 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_bn LIKE :P8 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_hin LIKE :P9 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */)

SELECT m_product.id, m_product.prod_img1, m_product.rest_id, m_product.prod_name_hin AS prod_name, mr.shop_name_hin AS shop_name
FROM m_product
LEFT JOIN m_restaurant AS mr ON (mr.id = m_product.rest_id)
WHERE m_product.status = :P1 /* {{1}} */ AND m_product.market_id = :P2 /* {{$_GET.market}} */ AND mr.status = :P3 /* {{1}} */ AND (m_product.prod_name_en LIKE :P4 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR m_product.prod_name_bn LIKE :P5 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR m_product.prod_name_hin LIKE :P6 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_en LIKE :P7 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_bn LIKE :P8 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */ OR mr.shop_name_hin LIKE :P9 /* {{$_GET.search_item}} */)
